remarks: Scalar product operation for the constructed full vector space H. (Contributed by NM, 2-Nov-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvhfvsca.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvhfvsca.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfvsca.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfvsca.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfvsca.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
dvhfvsca $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> .x. = ( s e. E , f e. ( T X. E ) |-> <. ( s ` ( 1st ` f ) ) , ( s o. ( 2nd ` f ) ) >. ) ) $.
$d E f s $.
$d H f $.
$d K f s $.
$d T f s $.
$d V f $.
$d W f s $.
